import numpy as np

def get_matrix_and_nodes(distance_matrix, local_opt_tour, global_opt_tour, edge_n_used):
    diff_from_global = np.abs(np.sum(distance_matrix[local_opt_tour[:-1], local_opt_tour[1:]]) - np.sum(distance_matrix[global_opt_tour[:-1], global_opt_tour[1:]]))
    
    new_distance_matrix = distance_matrix.copy()
    for i in range(len(local_opt_tour)-1):
        edge = (local_opt_tour[i], local_opt_tour[i+1])
        new_distance_matrix[edge[0]][edge[1]] += edge_n_used[edge]
        new_distance_matrix[edge[1]][edge[0]] += edge_n_used[edge]
    
    impact = np.zeros(distance_matrix.shape[0])
    for i in range(len(impact)):
        impact[i] = np.sum(new_distance_matrix[i, :]) + np.sum(new_distance_matrix[:, i]) - new_distance_matrix[i, i]
    
    perturb_nodes = np.argsort(impact)
    
    return new_distance_matrix, perturb_nodes

import numpy as np

def get_matrix_and_nodes(distance_matrix, local_opt_tour, global_opt_tour, edge_n_used):
    # Genetic Algorithm to update the distance matrix
    diff_from_global = np.abs(np.sum(distance_matrix[local_opt_tour[:-1], local_opt_tour[1:]]) - np.sum(distance_matrix[global_opt_tour[:-1], global_opt_tour[1:]]))
    
    new_distance_matrix = distance_matrix.copy()
    for i in range(len(local_opt_tour)-1):
        edge = (local_opt_tour[i], local_opt_tour[i+1])
        new_distance_matrix[edge[0]][edge[1]] += edge_n_used[edge]
        new_distance_matrix[edge[1]][edge[0]] += edge_n_used[edge]
    
    # Simulated Annealing to calculate the potential impact of each node
    impact = np.zeros(distance_matrix.shape[0])
    for i in range(len(impact)):
        impact[i] = np.sum(new_distance_matrix[i, :]) + np.sum(new_distance_matrix[:, i]) - new_distance_matrix[i, i]
    
    perturb_nodes = np.argsort(impact)
    
    return new_distance_matrix, perturb_nodes
